about_the_game:
Prop Haunters is a fun and fast-paced multiplayer party game where sneaky props and sharp hunters collide in a whimsical, action-packed showdown! Dive into a vibrant world filled with adorable environments, where you can play as a variety of quirky props trying to outwit a team of determined hunters.

As a prop, disguise yourself as everyday objects, blend into the surroundings, and evade detection with clever tactics and quick reflexes. But watch out—Runes give you the chance to fight back! Use special abilities like a flashbang to stun hunters, a speed boost to make a quick escape, or temporary invisibility to hide from sight. Runestones scattered across the map let you power up and take the hunt into your own hands!

As a hunter, your job is to track down those mischievous props before time runs out, using your wits and a keen eye to spot the hidden objects. But don’t get too comfortable—Runes also give hunters a boost based on their play style, such as increased speed for agile hunters or enhanced vision to spot props more easily.

With a focus on teamwork, strategy, and laughs, Prop Haunt brings hours of fun for friends and family alike. Whether you’re hiding or seeking, no two rounds are the same—every game is a new opportunity for chaos and hilarity. So, grab your friends, choose your side, and get ready for the ultimate game of hide and seek in the cutest way possible!

Key Features:

  • Cute, vibrant graphics that make every round a visual delight.

  • Multiplayer madness for up to 16 players.

  • A variety of props to play as, from chairs to teacups, each with its own quirky advantages.

  • Runes with unique powers, like flashbangs, speed boosts, and temporary invisibility, adding a new layer of strategy to each round.

  • Boosts for hunters tailored to their play style, helping them track down props with special abilities.

  • Dynamic environments full of unique hiding spots and surprises.

  • Fast-paced gameplay that's easy to pick up but hard to master.

Are you ready to haunt the props or hunt the haunters? The power is in your hands!

name: Prop Haunters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 or Better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 or Better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Prop Haunters is a fun multiplayer party game where props hide and fight back using Runestones like flashbangs and speed boosts, while hunters get unique playstyle boosts. With vibrant graphics and fast-paced action, every round is a chaotic, hilarious game of hide and seek!
